DOC.brief_summary: This study examine ability Internet-based program prevent college-aged woman develop eat disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Testing Internet-Based Intervention Preventing Eating Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 2 % 4 % college-aged woman suffer eat disorder ( EDs ) , many risk develop . A previous Internet-based intervention call Student Bodies ( SB ) , focus body image concern , effective reducing risk factor EDs among college-aged woman . However , original SB program account certain risk factor , depression compensatory behavior like self-induced vomiting , over-exercising , use diuretic . Image Mood ( IaM ) enhance version SB program take account depressive symptom use compensatory behavior . This study examine whether IaM reduce ED risk factor large population college woman high risk develop EDs . Participation study last 10 week . Participants randomly assign either receive IaM program place wait list . The IaM program , deliver Internet , provide information nutrition , exercise , body image , cop skillsâ€”including example exercise . It also include online message board monitor study psychologist . Each week IaM participant monitor behavior , keep journal experience , answer self-report questionnaire . Assessments eat disorder symptom ; weight shape concern ; depressive symptom ; incidence substance abuse , anxiety , depressive disorder complete post-treatment 1- 1.5-month follow-up . Those assigned wait list complete assessment receive IaM program last follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Primary Aim : Access computer Internet connection Weight Concerns Scale score great equal 47 Presence one additional risk factor , include history teasing , history depression , low level compensatory behavior ( define less four time per month ) Inclusion Criteria Secondary Aim : Access computer Internet connection Weight Concerns Scale score great equal 47 Exclusion Criteria Both Primary Secondary Aims : Current diagnosis eat disorder Treated eat disorder within past 6 month Currently receive psychological treatment eat disorder depressive disorder Started new psychiatric medication within past 2 month Exhibiting level psychopathology would interfere participation ( e.g. , acutely suicidal )
